abilities.desc: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
abilities.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

abilities.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
abilities.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

abilities.desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
abilities.lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.

abilities.desc: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
abilities.lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

abilities.desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
abilities.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

abilities.desc: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.
Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
abilities.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

abilities.desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as he's facing away from Axe.
abilities.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.

abilities.desc: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
abilities.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

abilities.desc: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
abilities.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

abilities.desc: Lowers the enemy's total attack damage, cast range, and regeneration.
abilities.lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

abilities.desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
abilities.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
abilities.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

abilities.desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely. Enemy Units take Pure Damage Per Second while in Nightmare.
abilities.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.

abilities.desc: Ends all ongoing Nightmares.

Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
abilities.lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

abilities.desc: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
abilities.lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.

abilities.desc: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 80%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
abilities.lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

abilities.desc: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.
abilities.lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

abilities.desc: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, damaging himself to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown.
Creates an icy path towards the targeted direction, allowing you to move faster and path freely. Enemies walking over this path will move slower.
A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
abilities.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

abilities.desc: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
abilities.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

abilities.desc: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map; this bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden. Whenever Crystal Maiden casts a spell, restores some mana to all friendly units within 1200 radius.
abilities.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
abilities.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

abilities.desc: Immediately stops the Freezing Field
Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.
abilities.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.

abilities.desc: Channeling. Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.
abilities.lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.

abilities.desc: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
abilities.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

abilities.desc: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow. Drow Gains Movement Speed for the same duration.
abilities.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

abilities.desc: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
abilities.lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.

abilities.desc: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.
abilities.lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.

abilities.desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
abilities.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.

abilities.desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 75 bonus attack range on the next attack.
abilities.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.

abilities.desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
abilities.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.

abilities.desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
abilities.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

abilities.desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
abilities.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

abilities.desc:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.

abilities.desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 325 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
abilities.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.

abilities.desc: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
abilities.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'

abilities.desc: Performs a short Omnislash for 0.8 seconds.

Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 3.2,3.8,4.4,5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 180 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
abilities.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.

abilities.desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
abilities.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.

abilities.desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 2.5 seconds.
abilities.lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.

abilities.desc: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 425 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.
abilities.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.

abilities.desc: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
abilities.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

abilities.desc:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.
abilities.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

abilities.desc:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.
abilities.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

abilities.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
abilities.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

abilities.desc: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
abilities.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

abilities.desc: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
abilities.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.

abilities.desc: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.
Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.

Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
abilities.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
abilities.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
abilities.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.
abilities.lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
abilities.lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.

abilities.desc: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.9 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.7. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.  Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
abilities.lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.

Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, the tethered unit gains a larger portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
abilities.lore: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.

abilities.desc: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.
abilities.lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with its unimaginable capabilities.

abilities.desc: Io gains bonus attack speed, spell amplification, and HP Regen based on max health.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
abilities.lore: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.

abilities.desc: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
abilities.lore: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.

abilities.desc: Break the link to the tethered unit.
Sends the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.
Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.

Primal Beast charges up and then runs in the chosen direction, knocking back enemies and allies alike. Enemy units are damaged and stunned on impact. The longer the charge duration, the farther Primal Beast's momentum will carry him. 

 Can be cancelled at any time with the Stop command.
abilities.lore: The Beast's single-minded focus on chosen prey leaves all other considerations scattered in his ruinous wake.

abilities.desc: Begins the rush to the specified location.

Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every 140 units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.
abilities.lore: As the only member of his species to arrive on this world, locals can only speculate on the Beast's size relative to his kin. Such observation would prove easier of course if the subject didn't eat everything it sees and destroy most of what it doesn't.

abilities.desc:
The Beast's temper passively provides bonus damage. Additionally, for every instance of 50 damage or more Primal Beast takes from enemy heroes, he accumulates stacks of Uproar. 

 When activated, Primal Beast releases a roar that slows surrounding enemies and grants the Beast additional attack damage and armor for 7 seconds based on his current stacks of Uproar.
abilities.lore: Already draped in a broken patchwork of barding and chains upon appearing in the mistwoods, the Beast tolerates no further attempts at subjugation.

abilities.desc: Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Lasts 2.3 seconds.
abilities.lore: Though none are certain whether his utterances have true meaning, most concede the Beast's powerful grip and tendency to smash his enemies into naught but pulp and pieces communicates his intent well enough.

abilities.desc: Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast.
abilities.lore: AGAIN WITH THE ROCKS!
